thread.section_title: Riff Chelsea - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Do not Trust the good reviews
thread.title_full: Do not Trust the good reviews - Review of Riff Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Paul C
title: Do not Trust the good reviews
text:
Dirty, loud, stained sheets,leaking ceiling and walls. Then charged additional fees for cleaning? $100?
Then I found another $100 charge a few days later and had to deal with that
Please go elsewhere!!!! Location is perfect but don't get tricked the reviews cannot be real.
Room Tip: Don't stay here See more room tips
